home_page.description: Qvoting is a decentralized voting platform running as a smart contract on the Qubic network.

error_page.error_404_message: Congratulations! You are one of the elite who managed to find our 404 page.
error_page.title: Oops!
error_page.unexpected_error: Sorry, an unexpected error has occurred.

connect_wallet_modal.scan_qr: Scan this QR code with your Qubic Wallet or copy the link below:
connect_wallet_modal.wallet_connection_gen_url_error: Failed to generate WalletConnect URI. Please try again.
connect_wallet_modal.wallet_connection_expired: Your connection request has expired. Please generate a new QR code to try again.

errors.error_fetching_data: Something went wrong while fetching the data. Please try again later.

rpc_errors.user_unavailable: You're currently busy with another request. Please complete or cancel it before trying again.
rpc_errors.tick_expired: This transaction took too long and tick has expired. Please try again.
rpc_errors.invalid_arguments: Something's off with the request. Double-check your inputs and try again.
rpc_errors.internal_error: Oops! Something went wrong on our end. Please try again in a moment.
